tip_0: Watch out of the E (Unraveled Earth) + W (Seismic Shove) Combo, if Taliyah Hits the combo you are most likely down to half hp, do this by picking high mobility and blink champions such as Ekko and Katarina.
tip_1: When she uses her Q (Threaded Volley), she gets locked into one direction, so just side step it.
